languages.text: {n}Арбитр без единого слова опрокидывает кубок на дорогу. Алой раной растекается амасек по отполированному тысячами подошв камню.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "На службе не пью",{n} — отрезает Арбитес, опрокидывая кубок на дорогу. Алой раной растекается амасек по отполированному тысячами подошв камню.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Without a word, the Arbitrator hurls the drink on the pavement. The splash of amasec is like a scarlet wound upon the stone that has been polished by a thousand soles.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Арбитр без единого слова опрокидывает кубок на дорогу. Алой раной растекается амасек по отполированному тысячами подошв камню.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Without saying a word, the Arbitrator throws the drink on the pavement. The splash of amasec is like a scarlet wound upon the stone polished by a thousand soles.{/n}
{n}Without saying a word, the Arbitrator throws the drink on the pavement. The splash of amasec is like a scarlet wound upon the stone polished by a thousand soles.{/n}
{n}Without a word, the Arbitrator hurls the drink on the pavement. The splash of amasec is like a scarlet wound upon the stone that has been polished by a thousand soles.{/n}

{n}Without a word, the Arbitrator hurls the drink on the pavement. The splash of amasec is like a scarlet wound upon the stone that has been polished by a thousand soles.{/n}
{n}Without a word, the Arbitrator hurls the drink on the pavement. The splash of amasec is like a scarlet wound upon the stone that has been polished by a thousand soles.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ohne ein Wort gießt der Arbitrator das Getränk auf dem Pflaster aus. Die Amasec-Pfütze wirkt wie eine rote Wunde auf dem von tausend Sohlen polierten Stein.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Without a word, the Arbitrator hurls the drink on the pavement. The splash of amasec is like a scarlet wound upon the stone that has been polished by a thousand soles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ohne ein Wort gießt der Arbitrator das Getränk auf dem Pflaster aus. Die Amasec-Pfütze wirkt wie eine rote Wunde auf dem von tausend Sohlen polierten Stein.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sans dire un mot, l'arbitrator saisit la coupe et la jette sur les pavés. La flaque d'amasec ressemble à une blessure sanglante sur la pierre polie par des milliers de semelles.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Without a word, the Arbitrator hurls the drink on the pavement. The splash of amasec is like a scarlet wound upon the stone that has been polished by a thousand soles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sans dire un mot, l'arbitrator saisit la coupe et la jette sur les pavés. La flaque d'amasec ressemble à une blessure sanglante sur la pierre polie par des milliers de semelles.{/n}

languages.text: {n}アービトレイターは一言も発さずに、その酒を舗道に叩きつけた。飛び散ったアマセックは、無数の靴底で磨かれた石の上に、まるで緋色の傷のように広がった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Without a word, the Arbitrator hurls the drink on the pavement. The splash of amasec is like a scarlet wound upon the stone that has been polished by a thousand soles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アービトレイターは一言も発さずに、その酒を舗道に叩きつけた。飛び散ったアマセックは、無数の靴底で磨かれた石の上に、まるで緋色の傷のように広がった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sin decir palabra, el Arbitrator lanza la bebida contra el suelo. El amasec derramado es como una herida abierta en la piedra, pulida por el paso de miles de pies.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Without a word, the Arbitrator hurls the drink on the pavement. The splash of amasec is like a scarlet wound upon the stone that has been polished by a thousand soles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sin decir palabra, el Arbitrator lanza la bebida contra el suelo. El amasec derramado es como una herida abierta en la piedra, pulida por el paso de miles de pies.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙一言不发，将酒杯丢在了人行道上。艾玛赛克酒飞溅在抛光的石头上，仿佛一条血红色的伤痕。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Without a word, the Arbitrator hurls the drink on the pavement. The splash of amasec is like a scarlet wound upon the stone that has been polished by a thousand soles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙一言不发，将酒杯丢在了人行道上。艾玛赛克酒飞溅在抛光的石头上，仿佛一条血红色的伤痕。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yargıcı, kadehi tek bir söz etmeden yere fırlatıyor. Amasek, binlerce adım altında aşınmış taştan zemini taze bir yaradan akan kan misali kırmızıya buluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Without a word, the Arbitrator hurls the drink on the pavement. The splash of amasec is like a scarlet wound upon the stone that has been polished by a thousand soles.{/n}
